availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. McCain (Caldwell County, KY, resident )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, resident. North Carolina native. Married to Louisa Jenkins McCain in Pulaski County, Arkansas, on June 14, 1849. Father of John McCain, Belle McCain, and Mary McCain. Reported as a resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Rock Castle, p. 152A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, California, San Obispo County, San Simeon Township, Enumeration District 075, p. 270D.
U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918, NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768 Roll #2, Kentucky, Caldwell County.
"William A.McCain (1826-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial #21519962, accessed January 6, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21519962.
